subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Edinson Cavani scored a hat trick, and Zlatan Ibrahimovic scored twice as Paris St.-Germain thrashed Guingamp to take a step toward a third straight French title.
snippet: Edinson Cavani scored a hat trick, and Zlatan Ibrahimovic scored twice as Paris St.-Germain thrashed Guingamp to take a step toward a third straight French title.
